r.s: Allows for quick two-way blowfish encryption without requiring the MCrypt PHP extension.
r.d: This package allows you to perform two-way blowfish encryption on the fly using only PHP. This package does not require the MCrypt PHP extension to work, although it can make use of it if available.
r.n: * Bump to package.xml v2.0 * Algorithm tweak for bug #12906 and bug #10162 * Switch to new BSD license from PHP 3.0 license
